positions.subtitle: Marquee Equity
positions.description: At Marquee Equity, we have created a cost and time-effective, one-stop solution for entrepreneurs to get investor ready and then meet the best investors in the world - in a discreet setting with investors.Equally effective from Seed till IPO.If you're in the process of raising, closing a round, or building your investor data room, we can help you get there quicker.
positions.title: Transaction Execution Associate
positions.description_html:
At Marquee Equity, we have created a cost and time-effective, one-stop solution for entrepreneurs to get investor ready and then meet the best investors in the world - in a discreet setting with investors.

Equally effective from Seed till IPO.

If you're in the process of raising, closing a round, or building your investor data room, we can help you get there quicker.
